title: Key Words: Senator wants Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg to potentially face prison term

title: Facebook Inc (FB) COB and CEO Mark Zuckerberg Sold $23.2 million of Shares

title: Facebook makes face recognition available to all users, spikes Tag Suggestions
text: Facebook Inc. FB, -1.89% on Tuesday said its face recognition technology is now available to all of its users with the ability to opt out.

title: Congressional antitrust panel to discuss Big Tech competition
text: The Senate's antitrust panel will meet later this month to discuss concerns that tech giants, such as Google or Amazon, seek to buy smaller rivals in order to head off competition.

title: Facebook brings face recognition to all users, discontinues 'Tag Suggestions'
text: Facebook Inc  said on Tuesday its face recognition technology will now be available to all users with an option to opt out, while deciding to discontinue a related feature called 'Tag Suggestions'.

title: Facebook may hide ‘like’ counts from public view

title: Facebook reportedly considers hiding 'like' counts

title: Tech Stocks Hit By France's Digital Tax: Trade War Brewing?

title: Facebook 'considering hiding number of likes on posts'
text: Facebook is considering a trial that would hide the number of likes posts receive, according to a report.
